pages.text:
# MAKE YOUR HAPPYMOMENTS, HAPPIER
# QUALITY YOUCAN TRUST
# PASSION LEADS TO INNOVATION
## Please note we only Deliver in Cape Town
## THE HIGHEST STANDARD OFFOOD PREPARATION
## ABOUT US
## OUR MENU
## GET IN TOUCH
## FOLLOW US
### Your Cart
### Cart is empty.
Global Cuisine
We work together to develop and produce high qualityproducts that we are proud of for a distinct marketthat we believe in.
We take on the worry, so you don’t need to.All our products are manufactured in a foodsafe environment.
We are so passionate about our products that innovation comes naturally. We love to introduce new items to the market, as well as  deliver consistently great quality products.
ABOUT US
Global Cuisine was established in 2020 and aims to be a pioneer in the frozen snacks industry. Delivering innovative products in a food safe environment to bring safe, but exciting solutions to the world of economy and premium frozen snacks and foods. Our products are high quality, wholesome, as natural as possible, and always designed to inspire and delight. We are halaal certified by NIHT Islamic Body in South Africa.
FLAVOURS OF THE WORLD
Delicious Ready-to-serve Snacks
We adhere to the highest standard of food preparation. Our attention to our food safety program and standardshelps to protect our customers and enhance the products we manufacture. Our highest priority is to deliver highquality food to our consumers, that we have the utmost belief in.
We’re passionate about the products that we provide to the market and believe that we add value to you by offering a wide range of products, simplified order and delivery solutions.
© 2022 Global Cuisine. Powered byVolt Africa.

		<meta name="description" content="Savor the nostalgia of homemade goodness with our delectable pies and sausage rolls. Crafted with care and using the finest ingredients, our pies boast flaky, buttery crusts enveloping savory fillings bursting with flavor. Indulge in the perfect balance of textures, where every bite is a delightful combination of crispy, golden pastry. Whether you’re craving the comforting embrace of a classic pie or the satisfying snap of a sausage roll, our creations are a culinary journey that captures the essence of tradition and taste.">
